channel.title: Untradeable
channel.description: How do you make items like partyhats untradeable?

item.title: Untradeable
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

In the tradeItem() method, use an array that includes elements, your IDs, to make them not able to be traded:

int[] untradeable = { int, int, int, int }; for(int i = 0; i < untradeable.length; i++) { if(untradeable[i] == itemID) { declineTrade(); return false; } }

I’ll assume you have some sort of declineTrade() method in your server so I’ll leave that there. As for the ‘itemID’ variable, change that to whatever the parameter variable is in your tradeItem() method.

Read full topic
